Location:		UAE – Dubai

Marketing and Management
CAREER SUMMARY
Apr 2015 to date Dow Chemicals
Position: Regional Business Development Manager
Managed the relationship with distributors in the Middle East.
Conducted trainings for distributors, sales team, and end-users.
Capitalized on industry and marketplace trends to strategize solutions
and enhance business operations. Achieved the "Diamond Keepsake" Award in Dow Chemicals in 2017, which is the highest award presented to a staff.
Collaborated with sales and mar CANDIDATE 		Sami Zakaria
PERSONAL DETAILS
Location:		UAE – Dubai
QUALIFICATIONS
MSc Business Strategy Leadership and Change - Heriot-Watt University 01/2020 - Present
BA Business Administration - Central Pacific University 2003 - 2004
Marketing
BA Business Administration - Lebanon University 1999 - 2002
Marketing and Management
CAREER SUMMARY
Apr 2015 to date Dow Chemicals
Position: Regional Business Development Manager
Managed the relationship with distributors in the Middle East.
Conducted trainings for distributors, sales team, and end-users.
Capitalized on industry and marketplace trends to strategize solutions
and enhance business operations. Achieved the "Diamond Keepsake" Award in Dow Chemicals in 2017, which is the highest award presented to a staff.
Collaborated with sales and marketing departments to support business objectives and client acquisition.
Jan 2014 to Mar 2015 Den Braven
Position: Regional Sales Manager
Worked on establishing and registering a branch, a representative
office, and sales offices in UAE. Set up a sales channel with new distributors in the Middle East and managed the supplier - distributor relationship. Achieved highest sales growth in Den Braven worldwide for fiscal year 2014.
Conducted trainings for distributors and sales team and applied effective marketing concepts to increase revenue.
Sept 2011 to Jan 2014 Henkel
Position: Business Development Manager
Managed both corporate and trading sales for ACB department in Saudi Arabia and Bahrain. Helped to create the company's distribution strategy.
Launched a range of new items in different business verticals: stationary (Pritt, Pattex), building materials (silicone and sealants, PU foams, wood glue), and craftsmen items.
Delivered a year to year growth of 87% in 2012 in Henkel ACC Department/Winner of Best Sales Person in EMEA Region in 2013.
Sept 2002 to August 2011 Pragma Group, Pluto Chemicals
Position: Sales Executive / Regional Sales Manager
Managed relationships with strategic partners: Carrefour, Plug-Ins, Sharaf DG, Jarir, Alghanim, Virgin Megastore, and Panda.
Managed a team of 25 members ensuring optimal results.
Generated sales and incentive schemes for strategic partners, including power retailers and wholesalers as well as handled BTL.
Devised the successful launch of Xbox 360 and achieved growth of over 200% in 2 years, 2008 to 2010.
COMMENT
High-achieving Regional Sales Manager with proven skills in marketing leadership and
campaign management and with over 18 years of international experience with both local and multinational companies. Eager to provide a high level of service and promote affirmative experiences.
Skills
Market knowledge
Sales experience
Business development and planning
Results orientated
Key decision making
Strategic planning
For further information please contact Jan Johnston on 01695 570 696 or email janj@johnston-vere.co.uk

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
